name: Instinct Versus Desire
desc: +5% Mag/Skl/Res and -5% Str/HP/Def growth for every tome in Tokiko's inventory. +5% Str/HP/Def and -5% Mag/Skl/Res for every sword/axe/lance in Tokiko's inventory.
components: 5 * len([x.nid for x in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, x) in ['Sword', 'Axe', 'Lance']])
-5 * len([x.nid for x in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, x) in ['Sword', 'Axe', 'Lance']])
